pageProduct.name: Optimum Nutrition Performance Whey Vanilla 1.95kg
pageProduct.description:
Information

*Visit www.chemistwarehouse.com.au/competitions to find out more

Why Choose Performance Whey?

This uncompromising blend of ultra-filtered whey proteins is designed to provide goal-driven individuals with a versatile combination of great taste, mix-ability and convenience, along with the world class Optimum Nutrition Quality.

Grow

Support the growth and maintenance of muscle.

Repair

Rebuild and repair muscle fibres used during intense exercise.

Recover

Support muscle recovery after exercise.

Whey Protein Complex

Using a premium blend of whey protein isolates & whey protein concentrate, we're able to pack 22G of protein into every serving to support your muscle building needs after training.

Natural BCAAs

BCAAs can promote more effective muscle repair as they help in supporting muscle protein synthesis.

Informed Choice

We use only the highest quality ingredients and our products are regularly tested for banned substances.

How To Use Performance Whey?

One scoop of Performance Whey ultra-filtered blend mixes up effortlessly in as little as 120mL- 240mL of water, milk or your favourite beverage using just a glass and spoon.

This all-whey formula is ready to go to work before and after training, in between meals, or any other time that you need to maximise your muscle recovery

Over 35 years, our obsessive pursuit of the highest quality standards has only been matched by our desire to see you achieve your goals.

For 2 billion Optimum Nutrition workouts around the world, we've helped anybody who ever had a fitness aspiration and believed that they could achieve it, from elite athletes to everyday gym goers and amateur sportsman.

But there's still one workout that is more important than any other, yours, make it count.

A Legacy Of Trust

For over 35 year, Optimum Nutrition has been the brand professional athletes and gym enthusiasts trust to support their fitness journey.

Dedicated To Your Goals

Over 2 billion times all around the world, we've dedicated ourselves to helping others achieve their fitness goals.

Obsessed With Quality

Using only the highest quality raw ingredients, we test and re-test to every step of the way. Just like you, we care about what goes into your body.

General Information

The Worlds #1 Protein Brand brings you Performance Whey - an uncompromising blend of whey proteins.

Ultra-Filtered Whey Protein Complex

This uncompromising blend of ultra-filtered whey proteins is designed to provide goal-driven individuals with a versatile combination of great taste, mixability and convenience, along with the world class Optimum Nutrition Quality.

Serving Size: 39g

Servings Per Pack: 50

KEY FEATURES

• Ultra-Filtered 100% Whey Protein Complex
• 22g of Protein per serve
• 5.5 g of Naturally Occurring BCAAs
• 3g of Naturally Occurring Glutamic Acid
• Banned Substance Tested
• Gluten Free

Warnings

To be consumed as part of a balanced & nutritious diet, not suitable for children under 15 years of age or pregnant women.
Should only be used under medical or dietetic supervision.

Ingredients

Protein Blend (Whey Protein Concentrate, Whey Protein Isolate, Hydrolyzed Whey Protein Isolate, Hydrolyzed Whey Protein Concentrate), Creamer (Glucose Syrup Solids, Coconut Oil, Sodium Caseinate, Dipotassium Phosphate, Silicon Dioxide, Titanium Dioxide, Mono & Diglycerides, Turmeric and Annatto Extracts, Artificial Flavor), Cocoa (Processed with Alkali), Medium Chain Triglycerides, Natural and Artificial Flavor, Lecithin, Salt, Gum Blend (Cellulose Gum, Xanthan Gum, Carrageenan), Acesulfame Potassium, Sucralose.

Contains: CONTAINS: MILK AND SOY.

Directions

One scoop of Performance Whey ultra-filtered blend mixes up effortlessly in as little as 120mL- 240mL of water, milk or your favourite beverage using just a glass and spoon.
This all-whey formula is ready to go to work before and after training, in between meals, or any other time that you need to maximise your muscle recovery.
